io.github.olyutorskii.doubdabc

Class BcdSequence

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.olyutorskii.doubdabc.BcdSequence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.CharSequence

    public class BcdSequence
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.CharSequence
    BCD Character sequence holder.

    It has CharSequence API.

    There is some API for character-output classes.
